儑字的基本解释

儑
án
心灰意懒，情绪不高。

儑
àn
开玩笑的话。

儑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ān］
(1)本指不慧，引申为志气低落。
(2)垂下。
[②]［àn］
［《廣韻》五紺切，去勘，疑。］
［《廣韻》五合切，入合，疑。］
［《廣韻》五盍切，入盍，疑。］
见“儑2”。

儑字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　儑； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页119第26
【集韻】吾含切，音玵。不慧也。又謔言。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?五紺切。不自安也。　又【集韻】鄂合切，音?。傝儑，不著事。　又與累義同。【荀子·不苟篇】窮則棄而儑。【註】優也。

儑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
儑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sigh
án
Disheartened and lazy, moody.
Sigh
àn
Just kidding.
Sigh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ān]
(1) This refers to unintelligence, but extends to low aspirations.
(2) Hang down.
[②]［àn］
["Guangyun" five cuts, go to survey, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" five-point cut, in-close, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" five cuts, enters, doubts. ]
See "儑2".
Sigh
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　儑; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 119 26
【Jiyun】I have cut, the sound is 玵. Not wise. And slanderously.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Five cuts. Uneasy too.　[Jiyun] The jaw is cut, sound?.傝儑, don't worry.　 has the same meaning as tired. 【Xunzi·Meticulous Article】If you are poor, you will give up and die. [Note] Excellent too.

Nothing.
án, àn

2) àn 开玩笑的话。
